resource:fish.name: Fish
resource:fish.description: A small gill-bearing animal that otters are quite fond of devouring.

resource:wood.name: Wood
resource:wood.description: Reminiscent of an old tree. Used for many, many things.

resource:aluminium.name: Aluminum
resource:aluminium.description: A soft metal used for creating cans, foils, kitchen utensils, window frames, beer kegs, and more.

resource:souls_of_the_innocent.name: Souls (Innocent)
resource:souls_of_the_innocent.description: Souls of those with a pure heart. Every full soul collected causes a catastrophic event to occur.

command:find_fish.name: Find Fish (Solo)
command:find_fish.description: Utilize your own skills to find a singular fish.
